name: Medic Express
description:
Work in progress... Game is planned to be submitted for Palette Jam 2 [8 Bits to Infinity]

Please leave feedback about things you love, things you love less about the game :)

Full screen recommended

Hi Here is how you play. 

Collect the green dudes. The more you have the faster you go too. 

Avoid the blue guys. They aren't nice. 

Collect flashing medkits, they make blue guys turn good.

Run into the bullseye to bank your points.

If you bank points with 10 or more segments you clear the entire field of blues.
